attributes.action: School Should Teach Punjabi and sikh religion to our children
attributes.additional_details: School Should Teach Punjabi and sikh religion to our children
attributes.background: School Should Teach Punjabi and sikh religion to our children

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the Government to require Sikhism to be taught in UK schools from Reception upwards: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596870

At the minute schools are required teach languages as part of the national curriculum, but it is up to schools what languages to teach students. You can find out more about language teaching in English schools here: https://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/CBP-7388/CBP-7388.pdf
